original_text: Your gold and silver is cankered; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you, and shall eat your flesh as it were fire. Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days.
korean_text: 너희 금과 은은 녹이 슬었으니 이 녹이 너희에게 증거가 되며 불 같이 너희 살을 먹으리라 너희가 말세에 재물을 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: Your gold and silver is cankered
and the rust of them shall be a witness against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들의 녹이 너희를 반증하는 증거가 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall eat your flesh as it were fire
Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 마지막 날들을 위해 보물을 쌓아 두었다
